parameters.name: certificateArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. This can be an Certificate Manager (ACM) certificate or an Identity and Access Management (IAM) server certificate.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map with keys of TagKey objects and values of TagValue objects. (string) --- The key for the tag. (string) --- The value for the tag.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the DomainName configuration.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. This can be an Certificate Manager (ACM) certificate or an Identity and Access Management (IAM) server certificate.

nested_items.name: appsyncDomainName
nested_items.description: The domain name that AppSync provides.

nested_items.name: hostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of your Amazon Route 53 hosted zone.

nested_items.name: domainNameArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain name.
